title: Supsciption Tiers
text: Subscribers gain access to the Stay In The Game platform as well as the ability to track and get recommendations

section.title: Tier 1
section.content: Tier 1 subscribers gain access to the Stay In The Game platform as well as the ability to track and get recommendations for one stock.

section.title: Tier 2
section.content: Tier 2 subscribers receive all Tier 1 benefits and increases the number of stocks they can track to three.

section.title: Tier 3
section.content: Tier 3 subscribers get access to all the benefits of Tier 2 and are able to track up to five stocks at once.
